sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_f8a8555d13617600d15e3d7ed144b087
sys_update_xml.payload: c.vms-status-tabs { .small-text { font-size: 10px; color: #595959; text-transform: uppercase; } .light-grey-bg { background: #f9f9f9; } .people-card-media { padding-right: 10px; padding-left: 10px; display: flex; justify-content: flex-start; align-items: center; float: left; margin: 0px; .flex-it-align-top { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; } .media-left { .list__photo { width: 35px; height: 35px; } .initials-badge { min-width: 36px; float: left; margin-top: 0px; border-radius: 50%; line-height: 1; font-size: 14px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 10px 10px; font-weight: 300; background: #AEB2B3; } } } .three-tabs { .orange { color: #e89033; } .green { color: #70be5a; } .red { color: #ff4000; } .bg-green { background: #70be5a !important; } .bg-red { background: #ff4000 !important; } .bg-orange { background: #e89033; } .all-tabs { display: flex; padding: 10px; .each-tab { width: 33.3%; float: left; text-align: center; padding: 20px 10px; background: #fff; border-bottom: 1px solid #e4e5e6; &.active { background: #f2f2f2; border-left: 0px; border-bottom: 0px; border-right: 0px; border-bottom: 1px solid #d31a1e; .name { color: #d31a1e; } } p { margin-bottom: 0px; } .name { font-size: 12px; font-weight: bold; color: #909090; text-transform: uppercase; //background: #fbfbfb; } .fa { color: #b4b2b3; } } } .tab-details { padding: 20px; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; .flex-it { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-around; } .svg-icon { height: 23px; width: 27px; fill: #9C9C9C; } p { margin-left: 5px; margin-bottom: 0px; } .detail-numbers { font-size: 18px; color: #595959; } } } }sp_instancetruepe-dynamic-tabs-widgetfalsePE Dynamic Tabsfalsefalsesp_widgetfabio.petito2017-03-15 23:18:19truef8a8555d13617600d15e3d7ed144b08735PE Dynamic Tabsglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_f8a8555d13617600d15e3d7ed144b087steven.gregory2017-06-03 16:54:03

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_ac5637be1303b600d0cf3192e144b014
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>pe-tab.service</name><script><![CDATA[(function() {
  'use strict';

  function tabService() {
    var service = {
      getTabs: getTabs
    };
    return service;

    function getTabs() {
      var tabs = {
        firstTab: {
          name: 'Reclaimed vms',
          badgeNumber: 15,
          badgeColor: 'bg-red'
        },
        secondTab: {
          name: 'Expiring soon',
          badgeNumber: 5,
          badgeColor: 'bg-orange'
        },
        thirdTab: {
          name: 'new vms',
          badgeNumber: 10,
          badgeColor: 'bg-green'
        }
      };
      return tabs;
    }
  }

  angular
    .module('pe-dynamic-tabs')
    .service('tabService', tabService);
})();]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>steven.gregory</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-06-03 16:10:47</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ac5637be1303b600d0cf3192e144b014</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>pe-tab.service</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_ac5637be1303b600d0cf3192e144b014</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>steven.gregory</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-06-03 16:51:00</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
